hero.badge: Sirviendo a las comunidades de NSW por más de 40 años
hero.title: Apoyando Comunidades Diversas en Todo NSW
hero.description: Empoderando comunidades multiculturales a través de apoyo al asentamiento, cuidado de ancianos, servicios familiares y programas de participación comunitaria adaptados a sus necesidades.

contact.title: Get in touch with Mosaic
contact.description: We’re here to help you find the right support, services, or local office. Whether you’re reaching out for yourself, a family member, or a client, our team will guide you to the right place.

form.title: Contact us
form.intro: Use the form below to ask a question, request support, or connect with a local Mosaic office.
form.responseTime: Our team will respond within 48 business hours.

placeholders.message: Please describe how we can help you...

descriptions.name: Please enter your full name.
descriptions.email: We’ll use this email to reply to your enquiry.
descriptions.service: Select the service you’re enquiring about so we can direct your message to the right team.
descriptions.location: Choose the office closest to you, or the location you’d like to connect with.
descriptions.message: Tell us a little about your situation or enquiry. The more detail you provide, the better we can help.

form.privacyNote: Your information is kept private and shared only with the Mosaic team supporting your request.

validation.nameMin: El nombre debe tener al menos 2 caracteres.
validation.emailInvalid: Por favor, introduce un correo electrónico válido.
validation.messageMin: El mensaje debe tener al menos 10 caracteres.

success.title: Message Sent Successfully!
success.message: Thank you for contacting us. We’ll get back to you within 48 business hours.
success.urgentNote: For urgent matters during business hours, please call us directly at 1800 813 205.

serviceCards.sectionDescription: Más de cuatro décadas de impacto real, construido mediante alianzas comunitarias a largo plazo en toda Nueva Gales del Sur.

settlement.title: Apoyo al Asentamiento
settlement.description: Apoyo integral para recién llegados incluyendo asistencia de vivienda, orientación laboral y orientación comunitaria.

agedCare.title: Servicios para Ancianos
agedCare.description: Servicios de cuidado de ancianos culturalmente apropiados que respetan las tradiciones y brindan comodidad en idiomas familiares.
features: Paquetes de cuidado en el hogar

familySupport.title: Apoyo Familiar
familySupport.description: Programas diseñados para apoyar a las familias a través de desafíos y construir conexiones comunitarias más fuertes.

communityEngagement.title: Participación Comunitaria
communityEngagement.description: Creando oportunidades para la participación comunitaria, celebración cultural y conexión social.

footer.description: Apoyando comunidades multiculturales en todo NSW con servicios y programas culturalmente apropiados.
footer.copyright: © 2024 Mosaic Multicultural Connections. Todos los derechos reservados.

cta.helperText: Whether you're seeking settlement support, family assistance, home care services, or community connections, our qualified team is here to help. All consultations are free and available in your preferred language.

steps.two: We contact you in your preferred language.
steps.three: We guide you through the next steps.

footnote.label: *Service Areas:
footnote.textPrefix: Our services may vary by location. Please

reviews.subtitle: Verified feedback from people we support, shared publicly on Google.

hero.headline: Starting Again in Australia? We Walk With You.
hero.subheadline: Starting fresh in Australia can feel overwhelming when rentals, work, and government systems are unfamiliar.
hero.bodyPrimary: If you’re unsure what support you need, your settlement caseworker will guide you through the next steps and help you build confidence along the way.
hero.bodySecondary: We listen, map out a simple plan, and stay with you until you feel safe, connected and capable.

programs.helper: Tell us whether housing, work, government forms or community connections feel hardest right now. We break each step into plain-language actions so you can see progress every week.

how.helper: Every pathway starts with your story. We match you with a settlement worker, agree on priorities, then check in until the plan is complete.

impact.helper: Short videos from Mosaic clients showcase practical wins: finding a rental, enrolling children, or feeling safe enough to volunteer, supported by settlement workers.

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive Settlement Approach
comprehensive.paragraph: Our team works collaboratively to provide integrated settlement support that addresses all aspects of establishing life in Australia. From immediate practical needs to long-term community connection, we ensure no aspect of your settlement journey is overlooked. Professional interpreters are available for all services, and we maintain strong partnerships with local employers, housing providers, and community organisations.

hero.headline: Living Independently at Home? We’re Here With You.
hero.subheadline: Ageing at home can bring new challenges for individuals and families.
hero.body: You and your family can rely on culturally responsive in-home care and friendly volunteer visits, delivered in familiar languages and guided by respect for your choices. We help you stay independent, connected, and supported at home.

hero.headline: Looking for Family Support? We Listen Without Judgement.
hero.subheadline: Raising children in a new country can feel uncertain and stressful.
hero.body: We work with multicultural families through confidential family support and welcoming community playgroups. Our focus is helping parents and children feel safe, connected, and understood.

hero.headline: Looking for Community Connections? We Create Spaces to Belong.
hero.subheadline: Finding connection and belonging in your community matters.
hero.body: We create opportunities for people to connect, participate, and have a voice through cultural celebrations, leadership development, and community activities. Our focus is building belonging, strengthening connections, and celebrating the diversity of our communities.
